summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.1°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 656 m), light levels (up 3483 lux), and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1605 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5495 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and near calm conditions. Chance of light rain, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
